verses.roman:
vṛndāvane 'kṛṣṇa' āilā,--sei 'satya' haya
kṛṣṇere dekhila loka,--ihā 'mithyā' naya

synonyms: vṛndāvane—to Vṛndāvana; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; āilā—has come back; sei—that; satya haya—is true; kṛṣṇere—Kṛṣṇa; dekhila—saw; loka—the people; ihā mithyā naya—this is not false.
translation: "Actually Lord Kṛṣṇa has again returned to Vṛndāvana. That also is a truth, and people have seen Him.
